continuity of learning and covid-19
​response plan

h2.font: This is an exciting time to be part of the Cesar Chavez Academy community!

strong.font: Our students are going places - come be a part of Detroit's premier choice in public education!
EDUCATING GRADES K-12 ON FIVE DETROIT CAMPUSES
OUR WEST-SIDE CAMPUSES ALSO FEATURE A BILINGUAL, MULTICULTURAL ENVIRONMENT AND ELL PROGR

td.div: ​Cesar Chavez Academy is accepting enrollment applications for 2019-2020, grades K-5, March 1-31, at 4130 Maxwell St. Detroit, 313.924.0317; Grades K-2, March 1-31, at 8126 W. Vernor Hwy, Detroit, 313.843.9440; Grades 3-5, March 1-31, at 4100 Martin St., Detroit, 313.361.1083; Grades 6-8, March 1-31, at 6782 Goldsmith St., Detroit, 313.842.0006; Grades 9-12, March 1-31, at 1761 Waterman St., Detroit, 313.551.0611. If necessary, a public lottery will take place on April 8, 2019 at 4:30 pm at the following campuses; 4130 Maxwell St., 8126 W. Vernor Hwy and 4100 Martin St. If necessary a public lottery will take place on April 9, 2019 at 4:30 pm at the 1761 Waterman St. campus. The office will be open at the following locations for enrollment opportunities; March 12, 2019 at 8126 W. Vernor for grades K-12 from 3:30 pm-6:00 pm and March 13, 2019 at 4130 Maxwell for grades K-12 from 3:30 pm-6:00 pm. Enrollment opportunities will be available March 2 & 15, 2019 at the middle school 1761 Waterman St. from 8:30 am-12:00 pm.
